resources.string: We need your help to make sure that ARRIVED will work properly on your phone.
It looks like you use a Honor device!
You haven\'t set a destination yet!
You haven\'t selected any contacts yet!
You haven\'t entered a message yet!
You have arrived at your destination!
Are you sure you want to cancel your journey?
Sending SMS can create costs. For more detailed information contact your mobile service provider.
This way you stop Samsung from closing ARRIVEDs background services. Those are needed to continuously update your location and check whether you have arrived at your destination.
If there is no such option the app should work fine.

Go to *Settings > Device maintenance > Battery > Battery usage* and make sure that *Background activity* is allowed. Find ARRIVED under *Settings > Device maintenance > Battery* and make sure that the *Put app to sleep*-option is disabled.

It is possible that ARRIVED is not working properly on your phone. Please check your *Battery settings* and make sure that nothing closes ARRIVEDs background services. If you have problems please contact us!
It looks like you use a Samsung device!
We need your help to make sure that ARRIVED will work properly on your phone.
